scripts.build:prod:server: NODE_ENV=production parcel build server/index.js --out-dir server/build --public-url /dist/ --target node --no-cache
scripts.build:server: NODE_ENV=development parcel build server/index.js --out-dir server/build --no-minify --public-url /dist/ --target node
scripts.dev:client: NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch app/src/ --ignore app/build/ --exec "npm run build:client"
scripts.dev:server: nodemon --watch server/ --watch app/build/ --ignore server/build/ --exec "npm run build:server && npm run start:server"
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development ttab npm run dev:client && ttab npm run dev:server
